campaigns.cancellation_reason: Switched to competitor with better API

insights: Customer explicitly mentioned switching to a competitor
API quality was the deciding factor
Growth tier customer with significant MRR indicates value-conscious decision
Recent churn suggests competitor made compelling offer
analysis.recommendation: Highlight API improvements and unique features vs competitors

emails.subject: We've Been Working on Something Special
emails.body:
Hi there,

We noticed you recently moved on from TechStart, and while we respect your decision, we wanted to share some exciting updates.

Our engineering team has been hard at work enhancing our API - faster response times, better documentation, and new endpoints that our customers have been raving about. We'd love to show you what's new.

No pressure, just wanted you to know we're constantly improving and would welcome the chance to earn back your trust.

Best regards,
The TechStart Team

emails.subject: Here's What Makes Us Different
emails.body:
Hi again,

We've been thinking about what you said regarding API capabilities. We wanted to share specifically how we stack up:

• 99.99% uptime SLA with automatic failover
• Sub-100ms response times globally
• Real-time webhooks with guaranteed delivery
• GraphQL and REST support
• Comprehensive SDK support for 12+ languages

Plus, our dedicated API support team responds in under 2 hours. We'd love to give you a technical walkthrough of our recent improvements.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute demo?

Cheers,
The TechStart Team

emails.subject: One Last Thing Before You Go
emails.body:
Hi,

We know you've moved on, but we wanted to make one final offer.

Come back to TechStart and we'll give you:
• 3 months at 30% off your previous rate
• Priority API support for life
• Early access to our new features
• Free API usage analysis and optimization session

We've learned from your feedback and genuinely believe you'll see the difference. This offer expires in 7 days.

If you're even slightly curious, let's talk. No strings attached.

Best,
The TechStart Team

insights: Lower MRR indicates cost is primary concern
No mention of feature gaps, purely financial decision
analysis.recommendation: Offer flexible pricing options and demonstrate ROI

emails.subject: We Get It - Budgets Are Tight
emails.body:
Hi,

We completely understand that every dollar counts when running a business. You mentioned pricing was a concern, and we want you to know we hear you.

We're not here to push a sale - we genuinely want to help your business succeed. Sometimes that means finding creative solutions that work within your budget.

We've helped hundreds of small businesses like yours find the right fit. Would you be open to exploring some options?

Take care,
The SmallBiz Team

emails.subject: Payment Flexibility You'll Actually Use
emails.body:
Hi again,

We wanted to share some flexible options that might work better for your budget:

• Annual billing with 25% savings
• Quarterly payments to spread the cost
• Usage-based pricing (pay only for what you use)
• Seasonal business? We can adjust your plan monthly

Plus, when you factor in the time you save and errors you prevent, most of our customers see 3-5x ROI within 6 months.

We can run a quick ROI analysis specific to your business - takes just 10 minutes.

Sound good?

Best,
The SmallBiz Team

emails.subject: 20% Off - Because We Miss You
emails.body:
Hi,

Okay, let's make this simple.

Come back and we'll give you 20% off for the next 3 months - no strings attached. That brings your Starter plan down to just $239/month.

After 3 months, you can:
• Continue at the regular price if you're seeing value
• Switch to a pay-as-you-go plan
• Cancel anytime with no penalties

We're confident that once you see the time and money you save, you'll wonder how you managed without us.

This offer expires in 5 days. Ready to give us another shot?

Warmly,
The SmallBiz Team

insights: Specific feature gap identified - inventory management
Growth tier suggests they were invested but hit a limitation
Feature-based churn is often reversible with product updates
analysis.recommendation: Showcase new inventory features and roadmap alignment

emails.subject: You Asked, We Built It
emails.body:
Hi,

We remember you mentioned needing better inventory management features. Well, we've got some exciting news.

Our product team has been working hard, and we've just released exactly what you were looking for:

• Multi-location inventory tracking
• Automated reorder points
• Real-time stock alerts
• Integration with major suppliers
• Batch and lot number tracking

We'd love to show you how these new features could transform your operations.

Interested in a quick demo?

Best,
The EcomShop Team

emails.subject: Built Specifically for E-commerce
emails.body:
Hi again,

We wanted to dive deeper into our new inventory features and how they're designed specifically for e-commerce businesses like yours:

**Advanced Inventory Management:**
• Predictive restocking based on sales velocity
• Automated PO generation
• Supplier performance tracking
• SKU variant management
• Warehouse zone optimization

**Plus Coming Soon:**
• Dropshipping integration (Q4 2025)
• Returns processing automation
• AI-powered demand forecasting

These aren't generic features - they're built from feedback from businesses exactly like yours.

Want early access to our beta program?

Cheers,
The EcomShop Team

emails.subject: Let's Get You Set Up Right This Time
emails.body:
Hi,

We know we fell short on inventory features before, and we're sorry about that. But we've learned and improved.

Here's our offer:

• Come back and get 30 days free
• Dedicated onboarding specialist
• Custom inventory setup for your business
• Priority feature requests for 6 months
• Direct line to our product team

We're so confident in our new features that we'll give you a 60-day money-back guarantee. If it doesn't solve your inventory challenges, we'll refund you - no questions asked.

Ready to give us another chance?

Best,
The EcomShop Team
